subject: Order #SSN1582
description_text:
Order #SSN1582

This order has been in a shipping status for a very long time. Last week it
stopped tracking at the destination country, passed customs and now it says
the tracking number you submitted was unable to track.

Do you have an update and an ETA?

[image: PF&TCO]
*Guy Moulton*
*Warehouse Manager, Tampa*
Direct: 813-392-3550
Mobile: 813-406-1577

*Charlotte Warehouse*
1921 Freedom Drive Charlotte, NC 28208
*Atlanta Warehouse*
3170 Reps Miller Rd, Suite 100, Norcross GA 30071
*Tampa Warehouse*
207 Kelsey Lane Suite A, Tampa, FL 33619
PreferredFloorandTile.com <http://www.preferredfloorandtile.com/>
[image: facebook icon]
<https://www.facebook.com/Preferredfloorandtileco> [image:
linkedin icon]
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/carolina-carpet-one/?viewAsMember=true>
[image:
instagram icon]
<https://www.instagram.com/preferredfloorandtileco/?hl=en>*Confidentiality

Copyright and any other intellectual property rights in its contents are

The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions

to the absence of viruses in this email or any attachments.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5374 中
